summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of McClellan Street from Cascadia Avenue to the west line of Mount Street Helens Place, et al in the City of Seattle, by paving under Ordinance No. 25047, creating Local Improvement District No. 2395 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
